summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mixed on Monday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 27
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Monday, with eight gaining and the other 11 declining.
Bitcoin fell 1.3% to $23,326 by market close.
